missionStatement.title: I'm Kelly
missionStatement.detail: I'm looking to continue working on great native iOS applications.

schools.title: Winona State University
studied: As a work study I helped work on the first iPhone development class at WSU.

schools.title: Rochester Community and Technical College
schools.degree: AS, Computer Science (2010) and AFA Liberal Arts (2009)

jobs.title: Broker Exchange Network, LLC
content: Performed maintenace on one of the largest IT equiptment broker websites.
Developed a small mobile web application and RESTful web service for their primary website.
Developed an internal tool for consuming inventory data from client emails.
Created a superset of the Blitz templating language and small compiling script to allow for localizations.
Built custom IT part reseller websites for clients on the Magento and Joomla platforms.
Built several custom PHP scripts to deliver IT part data to several brokers.

jobs.title: CoreLogic Solutions, LLC
content: Worked on new features and maintained primary realty listing app GoMLS.
Re-wrote deployment script for the app using Xcode command line tools, codesign, and Fastlane.
Wrote first version of iOS push notification server.
Developed prototype apps for the consumer housing and appraisal industries.
Worked on re-write of the housing listing app working close with designer to prototype new UX ideas
Implemented new and existing features in the re-write app: from UI with custom rendering/animations to the network stack to retrieve data.

projects.title: Marshmallow
projects.body: My own set of libraries to assist in rapid iOS Development. Currently MarshmallowCore is open source. Currently I am re-writing parts in swift.

other.title: Winona State Outstanding Student Recognition
other.body: I was one of two CS students to receive this recognition of my graduating class.

other.title: Publications
other.body: I served as RCTCâ€™s Newspaper editor-in-chief for one year and and their layout manager for three years. I won an award for page design in 2008.

other.title: After Work
other.body: I enjoy drawing/design, rock music, automotive repair, rollerblading, camping and spending time with my family.

other.title: This Resume is an App
other.body: This resume was generated by an app I wrote. Additional references are available upon request.
